attributes.action: Stop the possible closure of SCBU and Maternity Unit in Dorchester County hospital
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The closure of the above mentioned wards within DCH would cause an extreme uproar within the local community - not only would this more than likely cause a higher mortality rate in new borns, but a higher rate of transport costs in transfering people to other hospitals (i.e cost of fuel for air ambulance, petrol for ambulances etc)  Surely in the long run this would cost the NHS more money????  why waste £30 Million on a new unit in Poole when money can be saved else where within the hospital by cutting out agency staff etc

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to stop the possible closure of SCBU and Maternity Unit in Dorchester County hospital.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=SCBUclosure


Her Majesty's Government
